text: Mishawaka Pilots Club Airport is in Osceola, Indiana, three miles southwest of Elkhart. Open in August 1948, the airport serves small general aviation aircraft. Besides the main runway - (21/03), there is a grass runway (12/30). == External links == * http://airnav.com/airport/3C1 * http://flymaa.org/index.html * http://mishawakapilotsclub.com Category:Airports in Indiana Category:Airports established in 1964 Category:Transportation buildings and structures in St. Joseph County, Indiana
title: Mishawaka Pilots Club Airport
